name: Corona Survival
description: Corona is a virus shaped like the sun. This game was created when the state of corona attacked China in 2019 at the end of the year until it spread throughout the world, before the corona had also struck in this world, when the corona attacked again in 2019 then the virus was called Covid-19 (Corona Virus Disease 2019). Which means we are encouraged to maintain health, stay in each area if the area is exposed covid, and remain enthusiastic in fighting Corona. You also give advice about this Corona Survival game.
